root.mailContent:
Dear <%firstName%><%lastName%>,

As per the requesed raised we are hereby to inform you we modified the user Id: <%userId%> as per the requirements provided.



Please find attached document, for your further communication. Kindly note that the attachments are password protected.To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.



If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
Bank Admin Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
